about.details:
Incorporated in 1997, AB Cotspin is engaged in the manufacturing of cotton yarn, knitted fabric, cottonseed oil, and oilcake products. The company manufactures products based on the orders from its clients.

The company has one manufacturing facility located in, Punjab, along with 2 warehouses and 1 shop cun godown to manage its supply chain operations. As of the date of the DRHP, the company has installed 18,000 spindles for manufacturing cotton yarn, 441 mt p.a. for knitted fabric, and 6,750 mt p.a. for seed oil/oilcake. The company has made significant investments in its manufacturing infrastructure to support its product portfolio requirements and reach. Majority of the company's customers are from Punjab and Haryana.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Diverse product portfolio with a focus on quality
  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base
  • Repeat orders from satisfied customers
  • Location Advantage

faqs.question: What is the AB Cotspin IPO?
faqs.answer:
AB Cotspin IPO is a SME IPO of 2884000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.09 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹35 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on December 30, 2021, and closes on January 3, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in AB Cotspin IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in AB Cotspin IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in AB Cotspin IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in AB Cotspin IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'AB Cotspin IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When AB Cotspin IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The AB Cotspin IPO opens on December 30, 2021 and closes on January 3, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of AB Cotspin IPO?
faqs.answer: AB Cotspin IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for AB Cotspin IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in AB Cotspin IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is AB Cotspin IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for AB Cotspin IPO will be done on Thursday, January 6, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, January 10, 2022. Check the AB Cotspin IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is AB Cotspin IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The AB Cotspin IPO listing date is on Tuesday, January 11, 2022.
